name: load-test-experiment
description: Isolated load testing experiment with Node.js child processes

scripts.test:server: set TEST_CASE=1&& set RPS=16&& set DURATION=60&& node orchestrator.js
scripts.test:client: set TEST_CASE=2&& set RPS=16&& set DURATION=60&& node orchestrator.js
scripts.test:dynamic: set TEST_CASE=3&& set RPS=16&& set DURATION=60&& node orchestrator.js
